snippet.title: Warframe | Official Trailer | The New War: Act One Teaser
snippet.description:
The diverse factions of the Origin System converge next week when The New War update launches across all platforms on December 15. Take control of allies and adversaries alike including Grineer Trooper Kahl-175, Veso the Corpus Tech, and Teshin the Dax soldier as they fight back against Erra and the invading Sentients.

Get ready to experience all-out war during Warframe’s biggest cinematic update yet. Witness The New War through the eyes of new playable characters, plus discover a new Warframe, an epic cinematic quest, new Customizations, Weapons, Accessories and more. 

The New War sends players on a journey across three massive acts. Enjoy this tease from Act I, and get ready to play Act I, II and III when the update launches! Work your way through the full cinematic Quest, and experience epic plot twists and even more gut-punching action.

►► WHAT IS WARFRAME? 

Join 70M+ registered players in Warframe, a cooperative, third-person looter shooter set in a constantly evolving sci-fi universe. For more info, visit http://warframe.com.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayWarframe/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayWarframe 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playwarframe/ 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/warframe

#Warframe #TheNewWar #Trailer #PC #PlayStation #Xbox #NintendoSwitch
